name: Civil War Online Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where did the New Warriors fight Nitro, Cobalt, Speedfreak and Coldheart?
questions.explanation:
Stamford, Connecticut.

	Nitro explodes, killing many of the New Warriors and 612 citizens of the town. Because of this, public opinion is turned against superheroes.

Iron Man.

	Iron Man gives the suit to Spider-Man when he takes the younger hero under his wing and coerces him into supporting the Superhuman Registration Act.

questions.text: Which hero is Iron Fist posing as?
questions.explanation:
Daredevil.

	Iron Fist is actually martial artist Danny Rand, who has been a member of Heroes For Hire and a close friend of Luke Cage. He had been posing as Daredevil to protect the secret identity of Matthew Murdock.

questions.text: Whom does the Thor clone kill?
questions.explanation:
Goliath.

	Bill Foster was the fourth person to assume the superheroic moniker of Goliath. Foster was the assistant of Hank Pym, another height-increasing superhero.

questions.text: After Spider-Man changes sides, which two Thunderbolts members attack him?
questions.explanation:
Jester and Jack O'Lantern.

	The two pro-registration heroes, along with several agents of S.H.I.E.L.D., find the publicly-unmasked hero and attack him, only to be killed  by the Punisher.

questions.text: The Punisher is kicked off of Captain America's team.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The Punisher is kicked off of the team for killing at least four other characters: Jester, Jack O'Lantern, Goldbug and Plunderer. The last two characters were simply looking to join Captain America's team!

Iron Man.

	The friendship between Iron Man and Captain America has suffered because of their opposing views on the act. The two have engaged in one-on-one combat against each other a number of times.

questions.text: Where does Iron Man keep prisoners?
questions.explanation:
Negative Zone.

	The Negative Zone contains antimatter, and is home to Annihilus. Because it is inhabitable and largely empty, Iron Man chooses to detain captured heroes there.

questions.text: Who is the warden of the prison?
questions.explanation:
Captain Marvel.

	Captain Marvel is asked to assume the position of warden by the Sentry, and attempts to save the prison knowing that he is living on borrowed time. It should be noted that this is a seperate version of Captain Marvel than the one who died from cancer.

questions.text: Who is not a member of the Illuminati?
questions.explanation:
Black Panther.

	Although Iron Man invites the Black Panther to join the group, Black Panther refuses. Iron Man wanted the Illuminati to be a governing body of superheroes, but their different opinions make this unlikely.
